question: Ava is required to submit a 168-page essay. She already finished writing 1/8 of the essay. How many pages does she have left to write?
answer:
Ava has already written 1/8 of the essay which is 168 pages*1/8 = <<168*1/8=21>>21 pages.
So, she still needs to write 168 pages - 21 pages = <<168-21=147>>147 pages.
#### 147
